summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Part Number and Tender Document features for Lead/Enquiry module. All backend APIs (14 tests) passed. Frontend UI verified with Part Number field at product level and Tender Document upload section working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: Login authentication
Backend: Create lead with part_number in products
Backend: Create lead without part_number (optional field)
Backend: Update lead part_number
Backend: GET lead returns part_number correctly
Backend: Upload PDF tender document
Backend: Upload DOCX tender document
Backend: Upload XLSX tender document
Backend: Upload PNG tender document
Backend: Reject invalid file types (.exe)
Backend: Delete tender document
Backend: Upload to non-existent lead returns 404
Backend: Excel template includes Part Number column
Backend: Bulk upload processes Part Number correctly
Frontend: Part Number field exists in Lead Form at product level
Frontend: Part Number field positioned after Product Name
Frontend: Tender Document upload section visible in Lead Form
Frontend: Multiple products can be added with individual part numbers
Frontend: Amount calculation working correctly
Frontend: Part Number column exists in Lead Detail products table
Frontend: Tender Document section visible in Lead Detail (when document exists)
Frontend: Lead creation with Part Number saves correctly
Frontend: Lead edit form shows Part Number field
seed_data_creation: Test leads created during testing were cleaned up automatically
context_for_next_testing_agent: Part Number and Tender Document features fully implemented and tested. Part Number is at product level (each product has its own part number), Tender Document is at lead level (one per lead). Excel template includes Part Number column at position 5 (after Product). Supported tender document types: PDF, DOC, DOCX, XLS, XLSX, PNG with 25MB limit.
